name: 2024 the 14th International Conference on Power and Energy Systems
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be published into conference proceedings by IEEE, which will be included in IEEE Xplore, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus after the conference. \* The conference proceedings of previous conferences have been published by IEEE, indexed by Scopus & EI Compendex successfully.
organizers: Southwest Jiaotong University, UESTC, PES, IEEE
